open Powerpiont file
pick monday date
pick coming sunday date
concatenate both date
get ESB on call member
get Edt on call member
get edt on call member phone number
place concatenaed date 
place esb on call number
place on call edt name and number
save the Powerpiont
open email
new mail
paste the Powerpiont
Change the subject to "on call for "concated date
capture teh subject
enter the email id
verify 
send manually
